subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are ready to lend some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$364,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://erntlimb.com/
